abstract: New York Knicks power forward Kristaps Porzingis shows promise as team beats Washington Wizards, 115-104.
lead_paragraph: Porzingis had 9 points and 10 rebounds in 21 minutes, and Carmelo Anthony scored 21 points.

headline.main: Kristaps Porzingis and Carmelo Anthony Pace Knicks
headline.print_headline: Sports Briefing | Pro Basketball; Porzingis Plays Well in Knicks’ Victory

snippet: Porzingis had 9 points and 10 rebounds in 21 minutes, and Carmelo Anthony scored 21 points.
